attrib:
ADDITIONAL DAMAGE: 15%
BONUS SPEED: 20% / 28% / 36% / 44%
DURATION: 16
cmb: COOLDOWN: 23
desc: Slardar moves significantly faster, but takes bonus damage.
notes:
Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.
The damage amplification from Mask of Madness doesn't stack with Sprint.
lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
name: slardar_sprint

attrib:
RADIUS: 350
SLOW: 20%
SLOW DURATION: 2
STUN DURATION: 1.6 / 1.9 / 2.2 / 2.5
cmb:
MANA COST: 80/95/105/115
COOLDOWN: 8
desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
name: slardar_slithereen_crush

desc: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.
notes:
Stun works on magic immune units.
Does not stack with Skull Basher.
lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
name: slardar_bash

cmb:
MANA COST: 25/25/25
COOLDOWN: 5
desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.
notes:
Gives True Sight and shared vision of the target.
Works on magic immune units.
lore: Slardar's lure-light reveals even the most hidden of opponents, as well as their vulnerabilities.
name: slardar_amplify_damage
